actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to promote registered apprenticeships and other work-based learning opportunities for small and medium-sized businesses within in-demand industry sectors, through the establishment and support of eligible partnerships.

summary.text:
Promoting Apprenticeships through Regional Training Networks for Employers' Required Skills Act of 2018 or the PARTNERS Act

This bill establishes a grant program to promote registered apprenticeships and other work-based learning opportunities for small and medium-sized businesses within in-demand industry sectors, through the establishment and support of eligible partnerships.

titles.title: A bill to promote registered apprenticeships and other work-based learning opportunities for small and medium-sized businesses within in-demand industry sectors, through the establishment and support of eligible partnerships.
